Text: You're the friend who's supposed to move to Hopeful Island today, right?
Can you tell me about yourself?
Now you have to answer with your guardian, an adult!<n> Promise~
Set up a guardian authentication number!<n>The guardian will check if you participated in the quest hard and enter this number
I see!<n>The birthday of <이름> is <생년월일>!<n>Is that right?
I'm really looking forward to your arrival to Hopeful Island!
Then, I'll be waiting for you on the island of hope!
